name: Guryo, The Timestones Quest
description:
This is an action RPG game which primarily  focuses on the story of old Guryo, the last surviving member of the Naspian Order, as he tries to stop an impending danger coming to the Land of Naspi.

This is a mobile game for Android. There are at least 10 levels. But for this demo, one playable level is added.

There is an option in the  main menu to lower the graphics  for low end phones.

Game has leveling and stat system, a simple inventory with craft. 

Notes:

1) This is still under development.  Many things are still lacking as I work on this project alone. 

2) Audios and musics are still temporary.

3) UIs need to be updated.

4) Cutscenes and dialogue have been temporarily disabled.

Requests:

1) Any feedback will be greatly appreciated.

2) Donations are also welcome as a way of supporting this development. 

I'm not a full time game dev. The only time I work on this is after office. So, it is expected that it would take a bit longer.

Thank you in advance for your feedback.
